pipeline.name: mcp-workflow
pipeline.description: Workflow for loading MCP tools and calling them
pipeline.set-variable:
Create an notion page for the following dog breed: {{ __payload__ }} under the "Dog Breeds" page.
After this page is created, create 3 sub-pages for the following topics related to this dog breed:
1. History and Origin 2. Physical Characteristics and Appearance 3. Temperament and Behavior
